cells.data:
• Kill掉从ps查询出的一定规则的进程

    ps aux | grep totem | grep java | cut -c 10-14 | xargs kill -9

  • 查看调用dbproxy的进程

    cat dbproxy.log|awk -F'[' '{print $4}'|awk -F':' '{print $1}'|sort -n|uniq -c

  • 查看端口占用

    netstat -A | grep

  • 生成md5文件

    md5sum AvatarActivityDayStat_$(date +%Y%m%d).txt > AvatarActivityDayStat_$(date +%Y%m%d).txt.md5

  • curl发送post请求

    curl -l -H "'Content-type':'application/json', 'charset':'utf-8', 'Accept': 'text/plain'" -X POST -d '{"phone":"13521389587","password":"test"}' http://domain/apis/users.json

  • 过滤登陆用户名

    grep 'Request:' info.log.2017-09-05.0 | grep reallyByeBye | grep userName | sed 's/ /\n/g' | grep userName | sort | uniq > username.txt
